column4: hey, i have HardyHeron disk for 64bit and it wont boot in ANY desktop, ideas?
OK, so any ideas? The only desktop that works is the Failsafe Terminal
OK, where can I get some profesional help, real PROS?
i need the help of a super pro, good enough to program even
ok well i've installed it several times and every time i'm unable to log into ANY desktop other than terminal, the screen just flickers and get's back to the log in
what video card do you have
ok so you can boot up and go into the desktop just fine but you cant get into a console [tty] correct?
no I can't get into any desktop except terminal or i can boot in "safe Graphics" off the CD
no big deal we got cha covered
oh, sorry I don't know how mibbit works 0.o
